spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Hydrow Games: Post-Row Yoga Restore" is primarily identified with the "Soothing & Restorative" spirit. This classification is based on the description phrases "Recover and rejuvenate," "soothing 5-minute Yoga Restore session," and "gentle stretches and restorative poses," all pointing towards a focus on recovery and relaxation. The relaxing nature is further supported by the mention of 'Chill low, Cool/Downtempo' music, enhancing the calming environment. Thus, this spirit receives a strong score of 0.9.

Additionally, the image suggests an outdoor setting on a wooden deck by the water, aligning with the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. While not the main focus, this aspect contributes to the workout's secondary classification, with a score of 0.6, reflecting the nature-based setting.
